page.title: 20The Hunt-Cont.
page.content:
subscription is Â£250. There are 80 hounds kept by the hunt from which the huntsman selects 29 per meet.Hounds are always counted in couples.The hounds are kept in big kennels called lodges which are owned by the hunt at Whittonstall,near Ebchester.They are walked out every day by the kennel huntsman and his staff who teach them to stay together and not stray. During the hunt the hounds chase the fox encouraged by the huntsman's horn.The people on horse back gallop after the hounds over fields and fences. Last season 30 foxes were caught in this way.
We have enjoyed our work for the Domesday Project and look forward to seeing the videodisc.
